application.atds.transfer

Class TransferController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.atds.transfer.TransferController

  • @RestController
public class TransferController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for handling Transfer related endpoints.

      • addTransfer

        @PostMapping(value="/addtransferrequest")
 @CrossOrigin
public java.lang.String addTransfer(@RequestBody
                                                                                              TransferEO transferObj)
        Adds a new transfer request.
        Parameters:
        transferObj - The TransferEO object representing the transfer request.
        Returns:
        A message indicating the success or failure of the request.

      • findAllTransferRequestByPatientid

        @GetMapping(value="/findalltransferrequestbystatus")
 @CrossOrigin
public java.util.List<TransferEO> findAllTransferRequestByPatientid()
        Retrieves all transfer requests with the status "REQUESTED".
        Returns:
        A list of TransferEO objects representing requested transfers.

      • findAllTransferRequestByPatientid

        @GetMapping(value="/findalltransferrequestbyid/{patientid}")
 @CrossOrigin
public java.util.List<TransferEO> findAllTransferRequestByPatientid(@PathVariable(value="patientid")
                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String patientid)
        Retrieves all transfer requests for a specific patient.
        Parameters:
        patientid - The ID of the patient.
        Returns:
        A list of TransferEO objects representing transfers for the patient.

      • approveTransferRequest

        @PostMapping(value="/approvetransfers")
 @CrossOrigin
public void approveTransferRequest(@RequestBody
                                                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> patientids)
        Approves transfer requests for a list of patient IDs.
        Parameters:
        patientids - The list of patient IDs whose transfer requests will be approved.

      • rejectTransferRequest

        @PostMapping(value="/rejecttransfers")
 @CrossOrigin
public void rejectTransferRequest(@RequestBody
                                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> patientids)
        Rejects transfer requests for a list of patient IDs.
        Parameters:
        patientids - The list of patient IDs whose transfer requests will be rejected.
